name: Chinese Hospital
description: Chinese Hospital is a full-service, acute care facility with 88 beds, providing high-quality and culturally competent healthcare to everyone in the community. Whether you need emergency care, a specialized procedure or surgery, doctor visit, or support to manage a chronic condition, Chinese Hospital offer a wide variety of programs and services for all your health care needs.
